item.title: Command Help
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("dd")) { if (playerHasItem(995, 100000000)) { deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 100000000); addItem(146, 10); sM("You give in 100M coins for a @@@@@@@@@@"); } else { sM("You don't have enough money!"); }

you are getting the hang of this :), but you forgot a few things. I fixed the command for you

Read full topic

item.title: Command Help
item.dc:creator: @WhyPlayLegit WhyPlayLegit
item.description:
@WhyPlayLegit wrote:

Hey I was wondering what I should change on this command statement to make it correct.
Im pretty sure i have a syntax issue with it, but help will be appreciated.

Basically, I am trying to make it so, if the player uses command dd, and has 100m the 100m is taken away and the player
receives 10 of item id 146.
If I did this wrong please give me the right template. ty

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("dd")){ if(playerHasItem(995, 100000000)) { deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 100000000); addItem(146, 10); sM("blahblah"); sM("blahblah"); } else sM("You don't have enough money!."); } }

Read full topic
